original: @14a # // skad cig gis 'jam dpal gyi rnal 'byor du dmigs nas lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig le dkar po mar me'i rtse mo'i rnam pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsams nas spyi gtsug tu gzhom du med pa'i yi ge ham dkar
analyzed: @14a # // skad cig gis 'jam dpal gyi rnal 'byor du dmigs nas lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig le dkar po mar me'i rtse mo'i rnam pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsams nas spyi gtsug tu gzhom du med pa'i yi ge ham dkar
translated: Instantly visualizing oneself as Mañjuśrī, one should imagine at the navel a white drop on a moon disk, together with light rays in the form of flame tips.

original: po mgo bo 'phyang bzhin pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: po mgo bo 'phyang bzhin pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine at the crown a white syllable haṃ, inverted, together with light rays.

original: de nas thig le'i 'od @14b zer gyis bskul nas yi ge ham zhu bar gyur te thig le bsil zhing tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thig le'i 'od @14b zer gyis bskul nas yi ge ham zhu bar gyur te thig le bsil zhing tshim par bya'o //
translated: Then, stimulated by the light rays of the drop, the syllable haṃ melts and the drop should be cooled and satisfied.

original: sems brtan par gyur pa'i sngags pas ring por mi thogs par shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems brtan par gyur pa'i sngags pas ring por mi thogs par shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The mantra practitioner whose mind has become stable will soon develop wisdom.

original: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi sbyor ba rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi sbyor ba rdzogs so //
translated: The practice of Mañjuśrī’s wisdom is complete.

original: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Translated by the Khampa lotsāwa Bari Lotsāwa Gelong Dharma Kirti.
